question:
Consider the following pairs of dance forms with associated states:
  1. Kud dance - Odisha
  2. Tippani Dance - Himachal Pradesh
  3. Jhumur Naach - Chhattisgarh
Which of the above is/are correctly matched?
explanation:
Kud dance - Jammu & Kashmir
Tippani dance - Gujarat
Jhumur Naach - Assam
